title: Didn't get anything for linking facebook account.
body: As the title says, I linked my facebook the day it was available and added a few of my friends from Facebook. Today we were supposed to get a mystery champion (I only have 2 champions left, so I presumed it would be a mystery skin instead) and got nothing. Could a red elaborate for me?

replies.body: I woke up and saw in Skype all my mates had received their mystery champions/skins but I still haven't received mine. I was active during the event and linked my Facebook ages ago. Anyone from Riot able to help?
Same except i havent recieved my champ{{item:3151}}  please help
